WRITING.TITLE: TIL Miley Cyrus is the daughter of Billy Ray Cyrus. They starred together in short-lived TV show 'Hannah Montana', where he also played her father.

TIL there was a 70-year long propaganda campaign in France which aimed to convince residents that the USA was the main contributor in WWII and not the Soviet Union. As the propaganda efforts took effect, attitudes gradually changed.
